function commafy(num)
{
  num= num+"";
   if (num == "undefined"  )
   {
   	document.write("");
   } else {
	   var  re=/(-?\d+)(\d{3})/
	   while(re.test(num))
	   {
	     num = num.replace(re,"$1,$2")
	   }
	   document.write(num);
   }
}
function year(year)
{
 year = year + "";
 if (year ==  "undefined"  )
   	document.write(" / ");
 else
    document.write(year-1+"/"+year);
}

function zeroPadding(str, reqLength) {
 var newStr = '';
 var padLength = 0;
 padLength = reqLength - str.length;
  for(i=0;i< padLength; i++) {
   newStr =  newStr + '0';
  }
 newStr = newStr + str;


 if(!(str.length == 0))
 document.write(newStr);

}

function Assessable_value(ass_value)
{
  ass_value = ass_value + "";
  if (ass_value == "undefined"  )
   	document.write("");
  else {
       if ( ass_value <=0  )
             document.write("0");
        else
         commafy(ass_value);
      }
 }
function loss(loss)
{

      document.write("(");
      commafy(loss);
      document.write(")");


}

function FormateDate(v_date){
  v_date =  new String(v_date);

  if (v_date == "undefined" || v_date.replace(/(^\s*)|(\s*$)/g, '') == "" )
   {
   	document.write("");
   }
  else
  {
  	var dd = v_date.substring(6,8), mm = v_date.substring(4,6), yy = v_date.substring(0,4);
   	document.write((dd ? dd + '/' : '') + (mm ? mm + '/' : '') + yy);
  }
}

function FormateDateInDec(v_date){
  v_date =  new String(v_date);
  if (v_date == "undefined" || v_date.replace(/(^\s*)|(\s*$)/g, '') == "" )
   {
   	document.write("");
   }
  else
  {
   var str=v_date.substring(6,8)+"/"+v_date.substring(4,6)+ "/"+v_date.substring(0,4);
   document.write(str);
  }
}

function FormatHKIC(v_HKIC,v_DummyHKIC){
	hkic = new String(v_HKIC);
	dummyHkic = new String(v_DummyHKIC);

	if (hkic  == "undefined" || dummyHkic == "undefined")
	  	document.write("");
	else if(hkic  == "" || dummyHkic == "true")
	   	document.write("");
	else{
		len =hkic.length;
	  	str =hkic.substring(0,len-1)+"("+hkic.substring(len-1,len)+")";
      	document.write(str);
      }
}

function FormateShortDate(v_date){
  v_date =  new String(v_date);

  if (v_date == "undefined") {
   	document.write("");
   }
  else if (v_date.substring(4,6).replace(/(^\s*)|(\s*$)/g, '') == "") {
   document.write(v_date.substring(0,4));
  } else {
   var str=v_date.substring(4,6)+ "/"+v_date.substring(0,4);
   document.write(str);
  }
}

function NameBreakLine(i, length_per_line){
	var content=document.getElementById("bl"+i).innerHTML;
	DisplayLineByLine(content, length_per_line);
}

function MultiLineFieldBreakLine(i, length_per_line, length_per_line_of_name){
	var content=document.getElementById("bl"+i).innerHTML;
	var line;
	var start = 0;
	var end = start + length_per_line_of_name;

	do {
		a = content.charAt(end - 1);
	    b = content.charAt(end);
		if (start != 0) {document.write("<br />");}
		if (a >= '\uD800' && a <= '\uDBFF' && b >= '\uDC00' && b <= '\uDFFF') {
			end += 1;
		}
		line = getSubField(content, start, end);
		DisplayLineByLine(line, length_per_line);
		start = end;
		end = start + length_per_line_of_name;
	} while(trimString(line) != '')
}

function MultiLineFieldBreakLinePart7(i, length_per_line, length_per_line_of_name){
	var content=document.getElementById("bl"+i).innerHTML;
	var line;
	var start = 0;
	var end = 0;

	while(trimString(line) != '') {
		if(line != null) {
			document.write('<br />');
		}
		end = findEndIndex(content, start, length_per_line_of_name);
		line = getSubField(content, start, end);
		DisplayLineByLinePart7(line, length_per_line);
		start = end;
	}
}

function findEndIndex(content, start, length_per_line_of_name) {
	var count = 0;
	var end = start;

	while(count != length_per_line_of_name) {
		a = content.charAt(end);
		b = content.charAt(end + 1);

		if (a >= '\uD800' && a <= '\uDBFF' && b >= '\uDC00' && b <= '\uDFFF') {
			end += 2;
		} else {
			end += 1;
		}
		count += 1;
	}
	return end;
}

function DisplayLineByLinePart7(content, length_per_line){
	content = trimString(content);
	var inArray = new Array();
	var outArray = new Array();
	var inIndicator = 0;
	var outIndicator = 0;
	var isEng = isAllEnglish(content);
	inArray = splitString(content);
	for (; inIndicator<inArray.length; inIndicator++) {
		var in_len = GetDisplayLength(inArray[inIndicator]);
		if (in_len > length_per_line) {
			var left = in_len % length_per_line;
			var count = (in_len - left) / length_per_line;
			var pos=0;
			var j=0;
			for (;j<count; j++) {
				if(outArray[outIndicator]!=undefined)outIndicator++;
				outArray[outIndicator++] = trimString(getSubStr(inArray[inIndicator],pos,pos + length_per_line));
				pos = pos + length_per_line;
			}
			outArray[outIndicator] = trimString(getSubStr(inArray[inIndicator],pos,pos + left));
		} else if (in_len > 0) {
			if(outArray[outIndicator]!=undefined && GetDisplayLength(outArray[outIndicator]) + GetDisplayLength(inArray[inIndicator] + 1)<=length_per_line){
				outArray[outIndicator] += (isEng?' ':'　') + inArray[inIndicator];
			}
			else if (outArray[outIndicator]==undefined){
				outArray[outIndicator] = inArray[inIndicator];
			}
			else {outArray[++outIndicator] = inArray[inIndicator];}
		}
	}
	outIndicator = 0;
	var line;
	for (;outIndicator<outArray.length; outIndicator++) {
		line = outArray[outIndicator];
		if (trimString(line) != ''){
			if(outIndicator != 0) document.write("<br />");
			document.write(line);
		}
	}
}

function DisplayLineByLine(content, length_per_line){
	content = trimString(content);
	var inArray = new Array();
	var outArray = new Array();
	var inIndicator = 0;
	var outIndicator = 0;
	inArray = splitString(content);
	for (; inIndicator<inArray.length; inIndicator++) {
		var in_len = GetDisplayLength(inArray[inIndicator]);
		if (in_len > length_per_line) {
			var left = in_len % length_per_line;
			var count = (in_len - left) / length_per_line;
			var pos=0;
			var j=0;
			for (;j<count; j++) {
				if(outArray[outIndicator]!=undefined)outIndicator++;
				outArray[outIndicator++] = trimString(getSubStr(inArray[inIndicator],pos,pos + length_per_line));
				pos = pos + length_per_line;
			}
			outArray[outIndicator] = trimString(getSubStr(inArray[inIndicator],pos,pos + left));
		} else if (in_len > 0) {
			if(outArray[outIndicator]!=undefined && GetDisplayLength(outArray[outIndicator]) + GetDisplayLength(inArray[inIndicator])<=length_per_line){
				outArray[outIndicator] += ' ' + inArray[inIndicator];
			}
			else if (outArray[outIndicator]==undefined){
				outArray[outIndicator] = inArray[inIndicator];
			}
			else {outArray[++outIndicator] = inArray[inIndicator];}
		}
	}
	outIndicator = 0;
	var line;
	for (;outIndicator<outArray.length; outIndicator++) {
		line = outArray[outIndicator];
		if (trimString(line) != ''){
			if(outIndicator != 0) document.write("<br />");
			document.write(line);
		}
	}
}

function GetDisplayLength(str){
	var flag = 0;
	var total_len = 0;
	for (i=0; i<str.length; i++) {
		var a = str.charAt(i);
		if (flag == 0) {
			if (a == '&') flag = 1;
			else if (a == '<') flag = 2;
			else if (a >= '\uD800' && a <= '\uDBFF') {
				if (i + 1 < str.length) {
					var b = str.charAt(i + 1);
					if (b >= '\uDC00' && b <= '\uDFFF') {
						i ++;
					}
				}
				total_len ++;
			}
			else total_len++;
		} else if (flag == 1) {
			if (a == ';') {
				flag = 0;
				total_len++;
			}
		} else if (flag == 2) {
			if (a == '>') {
				flag = 0;
				total_len++;
			}
		}
	}
	return total_len;
}

function getSubField(str, start, end) {
	if (start >= end) return '';

	var flag = 0;
	var result = '';
	var index = 0;
	for (i=0; i<str.length; i++) {
		var a = str.charAt(i);
		if (index >= start) result += a;
		if (flag == 0) {
			if (a == '&') flag = 1;
			else if (a == '<') flag = 2;
			else index++;
		} else if (flag == 1) {
			if (a == ';') {
				flag = 0;
				index++;
			}
		} else if (flag == 2) {
			if (a == '>') {
				flag = 0;
				index++;
			}
		}
		if (index == end) break;
	}
	return result;
}

function getSubStr(str, start, end) {

	if (start >= end) return '';

	var flag = 0;
	var result = '';
	var index = 0;
	for (i=0; i<str.length; i++) {
		var a = str.charAt(i);
		if (index >= start) result += a;
		if (flag == 0) {
			if (a == '&') flag = 1;
			else if (a == '<') flag = 2;
			else if (a >= '\uD800' && a <= '\uDBFF') {
				if (i + 1 < str.length) {
					var b = str.charAt(i + 1);
					if (b >= '\uDC00' && b <= '\uDFFF') {
						if (index >= start) result += b;
						i ++;
					}
				}
				index ++;
			}
			else index++;
		} else if (flag == 1) {
			if (a == ';') {
				flag = 0;
				index++;
			}
		} else if (flag == 2) {
			if (a == '>') {
				flag = 0;
				index++;
			}
		}
		if (index >= end) break;
	}
	return result;
}

function splitString(str){
	if(str == null) return null;
	var rtnArray = new Array();
	var index = 0;
	var curChar = '';
	var curWord = '';
	var flag = 0;
	var HALFWIDTH_SPACE = ' ';
	var FULLWIDTH_SPACE = '　';
	for (i=0; i<str.length;i++){
		curChar = str.charAt(i);
		if (flag == 0) {
			if (curChar == '&') {flag = 1;curWord += '&'}
			else if (curChar == '<') {flag = 2;curWord += '<'}
			else {
				if((curChar == HALFWIDTH_SPACE || curChar == FULLWIDTH_SPACE) && trimString(curWord) != ''){
					rtnArray[index++] = curWord;
					curWord='';
				}
				else if (curChar != HALFWIDTH_SPACE && curChar != FULLWIDTH_SPACE) {
					curWord = curWord + curChar;
				}
			}
		} else if (flag == 1) {
			curWord += curChar;
			if (curChar == ';') {
				flag = 0;
			}
		} else if (flag == 2) {
			curWord += curChar;
			if (curChar == '>') {
				flag = 0;
			}
		}
	}
	if(trimString(curWord) != ''){
		rtnArray[index++] = curWord;
		curWord='';
	}
	return rtnArray;
}

function trimString(str) {
	if(str != null)
		return str.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g, '');
	else
		return null;
}

function isAllEnglish(str) {
	var isEng = true;
	for (var i=0; i<=str.length; i++) {
		var a = str.charAt(i);
		if ((a > '\u1fff' && a < '\uff01' && a != '\u3000') || (a > '\uff5e')) {
			isEng = false;
			break;
		}
	}
	return isEng;
}
